decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (148/014 Revision P1, 148/015 Revision P1, 148/016 Revision P1, 148/005 Revision P1, 148/006 Revision P1, 148/007 Revision P1, 148/008 Revision P1, 148/009 Revision P1, 148/017 Revision P1, 148/018 Revision P1, 148/019 Revision P2, 148/030 Revision P1, 148/020 Revision P1, 148/024 Revision P1, Unnumbered Design & Access Statement, received 27/08/2013, 148/031 Revision P2, 148/032 Revision P2, 148/021 Revision P2, 148/022 Revision P2, 148/023 Revision P2, 148/040 Revision P2, 148/041 Revision P2, 148/042 Revision P2, received 22/10/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey side extension and a roof mansard and dormer to the rear of the house
